Package model.enemy

package model.enemy
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BossEnemy
    One type of enemy.
    Enemy
    An Enemy is a non-controllable DynamicObject that kills the Hero whenever it or its projectile comes in contact.
    Enemies are able to be bubbled and free themselves from these bubbles after 5 seconds.
    Enemies change direction at random intervals, when hitting a wall, and when hitting Hero's shield.
    Enemies jump at random intervals as well.
    3 types of enemies.
    NotShootEnemy
    The enemy that cannot shoot.
    ShootEnemy
    The enemy that can shoot
